        Montego Upstream Services Limited is an independent diversified natural resources company which was founded in 2010. The company's line of business includes providing professional engineering services. We apply skill, market intelligence and entrepreneurial aptitude to everything we do. By employing local nationals, we build strong relationships with local communities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Control Officer (Female)

Job Location: Lagos

Job Overview

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "",
  "description": "Fave consulting is a Human Resources Management and consultancy firm that specializes in strategic HR management to enhance business growth, performance and transformation.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.)&nbsp;Production Shift-in-Charge

Job Location:&nbsp;Kano&nbsp;

Job Summary


	We are seeking a proactive Production Shift In-charge. You will be responsible for overseeing and coordinating shift-based manufacturing operations.
	The role ensures production processes are safe, efficient, and aligned with quality standards. It requires meeting output targets and effectively managing tasks in a dynamic work environment.


Responsibilities and Duties


	Oversee and coordinate daily manufacturing operations and team performance
	Set and monitor production targets, ensuring output meets quality expectations
	Plan, adjust, and manage production schedules for efficiency and timeliness
	Lead and train production staff, fostering motivation and accountability
	Enforce safety and health regulations across the production floor
	Supervise product inspections and uphold quality control standards
	Collaborate with other departments to ensure timely material supply
	Drive continuous improvement initiatives to boost productivity
	Maintain accurate production documentation and reporting systems


Requirements


	Degree in Plastics Technology with 10 years of Industrial Experience in a similar position in any reputed Blown Film or Flexible Packaging Company.
	Proficiency in production planning and resource allocation.
	Knowledge of safety regulations and quality control standards.
	Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.


Salary Range
N150,000 - N200,000 / month.

Application Closing Date:&nbsp;25th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in PDF to:&nbsp;recruitment@faveconsulting.com&nbsp;using the job title &quot;Production (Shift in Charge) Position&quot; as the subject of the mail.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

2.)&nbsp;Sales Representative

Job Location:&nbsp;Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;

Job Summary


	We are looking for a of a&nbsp;reliable and results-driven&nbsp;Sales Representative to join our vibrant fashion house.
	The ideal candidate should&nbsp;reside in Gwarinpa or nearby areasand be&nbsp;ready to take on responsibilities&nbsp;with dedication.
	Key duties include managing&nbsp;daily sales activities, delivering&nbsp;top-notch customer service, and overseeing the&nbsp;general operations of the fashion house.


Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE, OND.
	Minimum&nbsp;of 1 year of experience&nbsp;in retail or as a sales attendant.
	Must be&nbsp;digitally literate&nbsp;and savvy with&nbsp;social media
	Strong&nbsp;English proficiency,&nbsp;communication, and&nbsp;presentation&nbsp;skills
	Excellent&nbsp;customer service, with a&nbsp;friendly,&nbsp;punctual, and&nbsp;enthusiastic&nbsp;attitude
	Must reside&nbsp;in or near Gwarinpa, Abuja
	Available to work full-time.
	A fashion Enthusiast is a plus.


Salary
N55,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date:&nbsp;22nd July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in PDF to:&nbsp;recruitment@faveconsulting.com&nbsp;using the job title &quot;Sales Representative&quot; as the subject of the mail.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

3.)&nbsp;Office Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)

Requirements


	This is a Hybrid role for an Office Assistant located in Gwarimpa, Abuja.
	The Office Assistant will be responsible for maintaining cleanliness and hygiene in the standards in the store, fitting rooms, and office areas.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess an SSCE / GCE / NECO qualifications with 0-1 year work experience.
	Experience with Administrative Assistance, and Office Equipment
	Ability to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in the office environment
	Excellent organizational and time management skills
	Customer service experience is a plus
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	High school diploma or equivalent is preferred.


Salary
N40,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date:&nbsp;21st July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter (PDF) to:&nbsp;recruitment@faveconsulting.com&nbsp;using &quot;Office Assistant&quot;&nbsp;as the subject of the email.

&nbsp;

4.)&nbsp;Quality Assurance (QA) Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a seasoned Quality Assurance Manager with strong technical expertise in plastics and blown film production.
	This role is critical to upholding product integrity, ensuring compliance with international standards, and leading cross-functional quality initiatives that impact every aspect of our manufacturing process.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead and manage all QA operations, policies, and personnel.
	Develop and implement comprehensive quality control procedures.
	Conduct root cause analysis and lead corrective/preventive action plans for product deviations.
	Coordinate with Production, R&amp;D, and Engineering teams to maintain and improve product standards.
	Oversee internal audits, manage external audit readiness, and ensure adherence to ISO and other regulatory standards.
	Monitor and report on key quality metrics and implement performance improvements.
	Drive a quality-first culture across departments and enforce compliance across production processes.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Plastics Technology, Engineering or any other related subject.
	10&ndash;15 years of hands-on QA experience in Blown Film or Flexible Packaging industries.
	Strong command of quality systems (ISO, GMP, HACCP) and regulatory requirements.
	Demonstrated leadership in managing QA teams and driving operational excellence.
	Excellent analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills.


Salary
N350,000 - N400,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date:&nbsp;21st July, 2025.

Method of Application

Job Opening at Fave consulting




        
    

        
        Fave consulting is a Human Resources Management and consultancy firm that specializes in strategic HR management to enhance business growth, performance and transformation.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Production Shift-in-Charge

Job Location: Kano 

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a proactive Production Shift In-charge. You will be responsible for overseeing and coordinating shift-based manufacturing operations.
	The role ensures production processes are safe, efficient, and aligned with quality standards. It requires meeting output targets and effectively managing tasks in a dynamic work environment.


Responsibilities and Duties


	Oversee and coordinate daily manufacturing operations and team performance
	Set and monitor production targets, ensuring output meets quality expectations
	Plan, adjust, and manage production schedules for efficiency and timeliness
	Lead and train production staff, fostering motivation and accountability
	Enforce safety and health regulations across the production floor
	Supervise product inspections and uphold quality control standards
	Collaborate with other departments to ensure timely material supply
	Drive continuous improvement initiatives to boost productivity
	Maintain accurate production documentation and reporting systems


Requirements


	Degree in Plastics Technology with 10 years of Industrial Experience in a similar position in any reputed Blown Film or Flexible Packaging Company.
	Proficiency in production planning and resource allocation.
	Knowledge of safety regulations and quality control standards.
	Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.


Salary Range
N150,000 - N200,000 / month.

Application Closing Date: 25th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in PDF to: recruitment@faveconsulting.com using the job title "Production (Shift in Charge) Position" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Sales Representative

Job Location: Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT) 

Job Summary


	We are looking for a of a reliable and results-driven Sales Representative to join our vibrant fashion house.
	The ideal candidate should reside in Gwarinpa or nearby areasand be ready to take on responsibilities with dedication.
	Key duties include managing daily sales activities, delivering top-notch customer service, and overseeing the general operations of the fashion house.


Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE, OND.
	Minimum of 1 year of experience in retail or as a sales attendant.
	Must be digitally literate and savvy with social media
	Strong English proficiency, communication, and presentation skills
	Excellent customer service, with a friendly, punctual, and enthusiastic attitude
	Must reside in or near Gwarinpa, Abuja
	Available to work full-time.
	A fashion Enthusiast is a plus.


Salary
N55,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 22nd July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in PDF to: recruitment@faveconsulting.com using the job title "Sales Representative" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Office Assistant

Job Location: Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)

Requirements


	This is a Hybrid role for an Office Assistant located in Gwarimpa, Abuja.
	The Office Assistant will be responsible for maintaining cleanliness and hygiene in the standards in the store, fitting rooms, and office areas.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess an SSCE / GCE / NECO qualifications with 0-1 year work experience.
	Experience with Administrative Assistance, and Office Equipment
	Ability to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in the office environment
	Excellent organizational and time management skills
	Customer service experience is a plus
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	High school diploma or equivalent is preferred.


Salary
N40,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 21st July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter (PDF) to: recruitment@faveconsulting.com using "Office Assistant" as the subject of the email.

 

4.) Quality Assurance (QA) Manager

Job Location: Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a seasoned Quality Assurance Manager with strong technical expertise in plastics and blown film production.
	This role is critical to upholding product integrity, ensuring compliance with international standards, and leading cross-functional quality initiatives that impact every aspect of our manufacturing process.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead and manage all QA operations, policies, and personnel.
	Develop and implement comprehensive quality control procedures.
	Conduct root cause analysis and lead corrective/preventive action plans for product deviations.
	Coordinate with Production, R&D, and Engineering teams to maintain and improve product standards.
	Oversee internal audits, manage external audit readiness, and ensure adherence to ISO and other regulatory standards.
	Monitor and report on key quality metrics and implement performance improvements.
	Drive a quality-first culture across departments and enforce compliance across production processes.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Plastics Technology, Engineering or any other related subject.
	10–15 years of hands-on QA experience in Blown Film or Flexible Packaging industries.
	Strong command of quality systems (ISO, GMP, HACCP) and regulatory requirements.
	Demonstrated leadership in managing QA teams and driving operational excellence.
	Excellent analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills.


Salary
N350,000 - N400,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 21st July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter (PDF format) to: recruitment@faveconsulting.com using “QA Manager” as the subject of the email.
